Reviews.Content: Friendly Folk at Masaccio Very cheap, comfortable and clean accomodation, within 25 minutes walk of all the main attractions but out of the tourist loop. 5 mins walk from the No. 7 bus stop to Fiesole. Very friendly and helpful staff plus breakfast (5 euros - not included in room price) on the balcony overlooking lush green gardens. Shared toilets, didn't bother us but some might not like....
Reviews.Author: Zarotty

Reviews.Content: Not so Close The hotel was fairly close to the main train station in Florence (about a 9 euro cab ride), but a good 25-30 minute walk to the city's attractions.The hotel itself was very average. The room was large and we had a bathroom, but the bathroom was the shower so after I took a shower, the entire bathroom was wet. Also, we had a couple mosquitos in the room that chewed up my neck and the room was close to the hotel balcony and smoke would seep into our room when people would step outside to smoke. Also, the hotel did not have an elevator. Pros:Close to train station, large room, large bed, friendly host.Cons:Not within walking distance to sites, bathroom, mosquitos, no elevator, and room near balcony which led to smoke in room.
Reviews.Author: KoreanFood

Reviews.Content: Budget friendly hotel in Florence near Syracuse Unviersity Florence center       Edy Restaurant - Piazza Savanarola, - one block from Hotel Masaccio
Reviews.Author: earl2244

Reviews.Content: Dishonest staff!! If you stay there don't eat in their dining room. While we ate dinner they opened our room and stole my purse! Not just us the only other table eating had a ring go missing! They didn't speak any English, so naturally didn't understand what we were trying to tell them.The hotel itself wasn't too bad, although we were on the top floor , lots of stairs with no lifts. It was also further out than we thought, a lot longer walk than it says on the web site.
Reviews.Author: Alidun

Reviews.Content: nice The lord is very nice and easily to communicate with. He gave us a lot convenience during our visit to Florence.Our room faced the street and had a little bit noise.We shared a flush toilet with others, but we had known before we booked the room.So it's acceptable.Comparing the cheaper prise and convenient location, I would like to live in again if i had an opportunity to go to Florence.
Reviews.Author: spudwang

Reviews.Content: Great Find This hotel is a great little find in Florence. I have stayed there several times. It's not a lot of frills, but it is impeccably clean and the owners of the hotel are always there and willing to help - and make you feel very comfortable. It's out of the center of town, but an extremely convenient walk to the tourist areas yet very convenient to the train station, great restaurants. Very nice accomodations for the money.
Reviews.Author: PammyKate

Reviews.Content: Great value, great service, very welcoming It's great to stay in a place where the owner is at the desk, and is really involved with the day to day operations. Owners have a basic understanding of english, but have a complete understanding of hospitality and courtesy. The hotel is just far enough out of the center of town to detach it from the chaos, but not so far as to be inconvenient from the sights. It is immaculate, pleasant and comfortable and I would easily recommend it to a friend, especially if they are considering an arrival by automobile, as it is one of the few neighborhoods that is approachable by car. All in all, a very pleasant experience!
Reviews.Author: greatgregor
